title: ‘Succession’ S3, E4 Precap
description:
Chris and Wos are back to preview Episode 4 of 'Succession' Season 3. They discuss some key moments in Episode 3, compare the president in ‘Succession’ to U.S. presidents in real life, and speculate on what will happen in Episode 4 of Season 3.Hosts: Chris Ryan and Wosny Lambre
Production Assistant: Jonathan Kermah
